client

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.UserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.util.Observer

    public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.Observer
    This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tom Bjurenlind, Jan Rasmussen, Christer Sonesson, Emir Zivcic

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface()

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface(Client client)
        Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Client object, with will handle all the communication with the server (sending commands and receiving responses).
        Parameters:
        client - The Client to handle all communication with server.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object player)
        Gets called by the client object (observable) on response from server. Updates the view. Displays all changes to this client's player object's state (items, room, players in that room etc).
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - The Observable object triggering this method.
        player - The updated Player object received from the server to the Client object.
